name: Paper Bowling
description:
The doodle style bowling game provides many fantastic levels to play in!

Whether you like to power straight through to the nine pin or hook wide and skid-snap to the middle, with 100 different levels available, you’re sure to find one that suits your style.

In this game you can become that bowling champ in a different way: with doodle bowling on the phone! The game features 100 different levels.

Features Include:

- Quickplay!
- 100 different levels!
- Doodle style!
- A Bowling game with realistic physics!
